worksheet.name: Worksheet 1
worksheet.p: This is a sample worksheet, to demonstrate the authoring of worksheets in IVLE.
You can use any HTML markup that you like.

p.small: You can give students lessons in between problems.

worksheet.p: The Python print statement can be used to write text to the screen. Try it in this exercise.
The next problem is a bit harder. It requires you to manipulate several files.
Now functions can be used to compute values.
